changeDebt(uint256,address,bool).details: addresses with debt balances cannot transfer collateralized sTHEO until the debt has been repaid.

changeDebt(uint256,address,bool).notice: this function is called by the treasury, and informs sTHEO of changes to debt.

rebase(uint256,uint256).notice: increases sTHEO supply to increase staking balances relative to profit_
